Headline: #55 Garfield & 1#71 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: Revised: WB 55 Garfield & 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses temp rrtd via 55th, Lake Park, 51st, Woodlawn & 55th: due to police activity near 55th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Westbound #55 Garfield and #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Lake Park, 51st, Woodlawn and 55th: due to police activity near 55th/Blackstone.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
